page.title: 12In The Streets
page.content: Sometimes in a quiet street children play cricket. They use a lamp-post for the wickets, they might draw wickets with stone on the lamp-posts. It can be very very annoying if a car is parked right in front of it. Sometimes cars come along and you will have to stop. Children play footbal against a fence, but you have to be careful of losing the ball, or they might smash a window. They might even ride their bikes around. IN PARKS OR OPEN FIELDS - They could play football,or cricket. Sometimes people play golf. You will have to be careful that you don't lose the ball. There are tennis courts and you have to pay to play. They climb trees. They make ramps to jump over with their bikes.
